text:
this completely negates the arguments i got when i set up a local environment that uses an SCSS file for each module (which i desperately wanted for ease of updating and lower risk of collisions). “but you shouldn’t do that; it’s multiple CSS files on the page, do you like slow?” :woman-shrugging::skin-tone-3:

yeah i still have to extract any CSS+HubL declarations into the .html file, which does still suck, but being able to compile SCSS into my modules and edit it quickly, without expensive overhead, is so. worth. it.
